title: Ketheric's Warhammer
content:
Some nights before bed, Ketheric would sneak a whey-faced glance at the hammer, and think about the stone, and wonder what unknown facet of his heart wore his weight.

BG3 Ketheric's Warhammer Information

Weapon Enchantment +1 1d10 (1d8)+5Bludgeoning +1d4Psychic Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Backbreaker Concussive Smash Weakening Strike Warhammer Versatile Range: 1.5 m

Backbreaker Concussive Smash Weakening Strike

BG3 Ketheric's Warhammer Location & Where to Find

Location: Mind
